title: Certain Death
description: Sixth in the brilliantly addictive new series of murder mysteries by an acclaimed and popular writer. When the circus comes to town, Poppy Fields and best friend Graham soon discover that the 'certain death' promised on the posters is no joke. With one person dead and the circus performers still in grave danger, the pair will have to work fast to discover who's firing the shots...This title features Miss Marple for the younger reader.
author: Tanya Landman
